title: Menu Display - Render Coffee Items Correctly
description: Verify that the coffee menu items are displayed with accurate names, prices, and descriptions, and that the 'add to cart' button is present and functional for each item.

steps.description: Navigate to the homepage.
Verify all coffee menu items are listed.
Check each item displays the correct price and description.
Ensure that an 'add to cart' button is present and clickable for each menu item.

title: Shopping Cart - Add Item Functionality
description: Test adding a coffee item to the shopping cart updates the cart state and UI accordingly.

steps.description: On the menu page, click the 'add to cart' button for a coffee item.
Verify the shopping cart context updates to include the selected coffee item.
Confirm the shopping cart UI reflects the added item with correct details and quantity.

title: Shopping Cart - Remove Item Functionality
description: Ensure removing a coffee item from the shopping cart updates the cart state and UI correctly.

steps.description: Add a coffee item to the cart if none exists.
Remove the coffee item from the cart.
Verify the item is removed from the shopping cart context state.
Confirm the shopping cart UI no longer displays the removed item.

title: Shopping Cart - Update Item Quantity
description: Validate updating the quantity of an item in the shopping cart updates the context state and UI appropriately, including edge cases of minimum (1) and maximum quantities.

steps.description: Add a coffee item to the cart.
Increase the quantity of the item and verify the updated quantity.
Ensure the shopping cart context reflects the increased quantity.
Confirm the UI updates to show the new quantity.
Decrease the quantity to 1.
Verify the cart quantity does not go below 1.
Attempt to set quantity to zero or negative value via UI or context.
Confirm the application prevents invalid quantities and handles errors gracefully.

title: Order Process - PreOrder Modal Display
description: Verify that clicking 'Proceed to Order' in the cart triggers the PreOrderModal showing accurate order details for confirmation.

steps.description: Add one or more items to the shopping cart.
Click the button to proceed to order and open the PreOrderModal.
Verify the PreOrderModal displays all selected items with correct quantities, prices, and total.
Ensure modal controls allow confirmation or cancellation.

title: Order Process - Confirm Order and Redirect to WhatsApp
description: Confirm that order confirmation from PreOrderModal opens WhatsApp with the order message prefilled correctly.

steps.description: Complete a valid order in the PreOrderModal.
Click the confirm button to finalize the order.
Check that WhatsApp opens with a correctly formatted message containing the order details.
Validate the order details in the WhatsApp message match the cart contents.

title: Responsive Navigation - Desktop and Mobile
description: Test that the navigation bar and mobile floating menu render correctly and enable navigation on their respective viewports.

steps.description: Load the site on a desktop viewport.
Verify the top navigation bar displays all functional navigation links.
Resize the viewport to a mobile screen size.
Confirm the mobile floating menu appears and navigation links are accessible and functional.
Use navigation to switch between site sections.
Validate that navigation transitions are smooth and correct content is loaded.

title: Animated UI Components - Float and Entry Animations
description: Verify that UI animations for floating images and menu item entry perform smoothly without visual glitches or performance issues on supported devices.

steps.description: Navigate to the menu page.
Observe that floating images and entry animations occur smoothly on menu items.
Verify no jank or frame drops during animation.
Test animations on multiple devices and browsers.

title: Location Map - Store Location Display and Interaction
description: Ensure the interactive React Leaflet map displays the Domcy Coffee store location correctly and supports user interactions like zoom and pan.

steps.description: Navigate to the location map section.
Verify the store location marker is correctly positioned on the map.
Use zoom controls to zoom in and out on the map.
Confirm zoom functions respond correctly without errors.
Click and drag on the map to pan the view.
Ensure panning is smooth and the map updates accordingly.

title: Error Handling - Invalid Quantity Inputs
description: Verify the application handles invalid inputs for quantity updates gracefully, including non-numeric, negative, and zero values.

steps.description: Attempt to set item quantity to non-numeric input via UI.
Check that input validation prevents the update and shows appropriate error or ignores invalid input.
Attempt to set item quantity to zero or negative number.
Confirm the cart does not accept the change and maintains previous valid quantity.

title: Shopping Cart - State Persistence After Navigation
description: Ensure that shopping cart state persists correctly when navigating between different pages of the app.

steps.description: Add items to the shopping cart.
Navigate to different sections/pages of the app using navigation components.
Verify the shopping cart retains previously added items and quantities on each page.

title: UI - Accessibility Standards Compliance
description: Check that all UI components including buttons, navigation, and modals are accessible per WCAG standards (keyboard navigable, with proper ARIA labels).

steps.description: Attempt to navigate the entire app using keyboard only.
Ensure all interactive elements are reachable and operable via keyboard.
Validate presence of ARIA attributes on critical UI components to support screen readers.
